description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the Lightning JS framework. It manages an internal state to toggle favorite status and updates displayed text based on user interaction.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: Lightning JS component that toggles between 'favorited' and 'unfavorited' states upon user input.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
